numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the graphs depict several leagues.
2. Major League Baseball is one of these leagues.
3. In every depicted league except Major League Baseball, a majority of players are players of color.
4. In all these graphs, the percentage of head coaches of color is under 50%.
5. I wonder why there are not more head coaches of color in these leagues.
6. I wonder why there is not more diversity in Major League Baseball.
7. Before I saw these graphs, I did not know about the lack of diversity among head coaches of color in sports leagues.
8. Now I feel more aware of racism in sports.
9. I feel inclined to do more research.
10. I want to educate myself further.
11. The headline is: Is diversity out of our league?
